metadata.name: Suspicious Invoke-WebRequest Execution With DirectIP
metadata.comment: Detects calls to PowerShell with Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet using direct IP access

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('curl ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-webrequest')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iwr ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wget '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://4')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://5')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://6')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://7')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://8')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://9'))))

output.summary: Detects calls to PowerShell with Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet using direct IP access
